title: NTP Ep. 23 - What Happens When We Believe God Can Do Anything {Finale}
description:
Nothing is more dangerous, more compelling, more freeing, more radical, more real, more satisfying, more powerful than a person holding a smidgen of faith. A sincere faith in Jesus and all He wants to do around us wakes us up, rattles our lives, shifts every perspective, issues hope in pain, and ignites purpose.

Thanks to Away for supporting Made For This. Go to awaytravel.com/madeforthis to start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials – including their best-selling suitcases
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
